item.description:
We will walk the paved trail around the Metropolitan District Commission’s West Hartford reservation. This set of reservoirs were created in the 1890’s to supply water to the Hartford area. It is now a popular recreation spot with lots of visitors every day.

This will be an easy walk of about 3 miles with some easy up hills. Social walking pace. We will be out for 2 hours. Rain cancels. Dogs and children are welcome as long as they are calm and well behaved. Dogs must be on leash (local rules).

Location: 1620 Farmington Ave, West Hartford, CT. The parking lot is on the left as you drive in.
http://maps.google.co...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Reservoir 1 Walk, West Hartford CT
